definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: a thin cake, (RV) wafer (cf. Ar. ruqa0qah;un a thin round cake of bread), always of unleavened bread: Ex 29:23 = Le 8:26 [[אֶחָד]] ´[[ר]]:, [[רְקִיק מַצָּה אֶחָד]] Nu 6:19, [[רְקִיקֵי מַצּוֹת]] Ex 29:2, Le 2:4, Le 7:12, Nu 6:15 (all P), 1Ch 23:29.—LXX la/ganon.
